subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: An era is on the cusp of a changeover, with the attention shifting from Roger Federer to the defending U.S. Open champion Rafael Nadal and to Novak Djokovic.
snippet: An era is on the cusp of a changeover, with the attention shifting from Roger Federer to the defending U.S. Open champion Rafael Nadal and to Novak Djokovic.
